attributes.action: Make prudent use of time and resources by not ratifying the rejected EU Treaty, a treaty that cannot now be implemented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the EU Treaty has now been officially rejected further expenditure and use of resources and time in ratifying the treaty would be a waste. These resources should be used more prudently and to the benefit of the British electorate. What possible benefit can come of ratifying a treaty that can not be implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
